Text: Does this work with FSPassengers? Because I downloaded same package long ago and when I use FSPassengers the display window is black and my icon changes from normal to the loading icon. Anyway thank you for the torrent as usual.

Warning!  Disable your internet every time you use this program.

It's collecting your IP address.

I read in the FS2Crew forum on Avsim a lot of guys are getting busted for piracy because of this.

But what's the worst you're going to get?  A letter in mail from your ISP?

What can they do?
peace rock, a fix is available for FSPax, but you need to contact the FS2Crew developer to get it
so it is safe to run it normally with internet or not
